item.title: Android Unity Game Popups “Screen Overlay Deteched
item.description: Gossip less, talk directly to the problem. On the Samsung Tablet T710 device, the system version is Android 6.0.1. The game developed by the Unity engine will pop up a “screen overlay detection” prompt dialog when applying for Android dangerous permissions.
